description.p: This rune allows you to attempt to paralyze a creature when activated. The rune must be attached to a weapon, and once applied, it cannot be removed without destroying the rune and possibly the weapon.

setters.set: Roll a d100. On a roll of 90-100 (10% chance), the rune activates.

Upon activation, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is paralyzed for 1 round. The difficulty and duration increase with the rune’s strength:
Novice: DC 13, paralysis lasts 1 round.
Journeyman: DC 14, paralysis lasts 1 round.
Expert: DC 15, paralysis lasts 1 round.
Master: DC 16, paralysis lasts 1 round.
Grandmaster: DC 17, paralysis lasts 1 round.
Masterpiece: DC 18, paralysis lasts 1 round.
Paragon: DC 19, paralysis lasts 1 round.
The rune regains its use after a long rest.

description.p: This rune allows you to slow a target when activated. The rune must be attached to a weapon, and once applied, it cannot be removed without destroying the rune and possibly the weapon.

setters.set: Roll a d100. On a roll of 90-100 (10% chance), the rune activates.

Upon activation, the target must make a Dexterity saving throw to resist the effect. On a failed save, the target’s movement speed is reduced for 1 minute. The reduction increases with the rune’s strength:
Novice: DC 13, reduce movement speed by 10 feet.
Journeyman: DC 14, reduce movement speed by 15 feet.
Expert: DC 15, reduce movement speed by 20 feet.
Master: DC 16, reduce movement speed by 25 feet.
Grandmaster: DC 17, reduce movement speed by 30 feet.
Masterpiece: DC 18, reduce movement speed by 35 feet.
Paragon: DC 19, reduce movement speed by 40 feet.
The rune regains its use after a long rest.

description.p: This rune imbues a weapon with the power of cold iron, making it especially effective against undead. The damage dealt to undead increases with the rarity of the rune.

setters.set: The weapon imbued with this rune deals additional damage to undead.

The damage against undead increases with the rune’s strength:
Novice: +2 damage against undead.
Journeyman: +4 damage against undead.
Expert: +6 damage against undead.
Master: +8 damage against undead.
Grandmaster: +10 damage against undead.
Masterpiece: +12 damage against undead.
Paragon: +14 damage against undead.
The rune is permanent once applied.

description.p: This sigil imbues armor with enhanced durability, significantly increasing its protective qualities at the cost of the wearer’s health.

setters.set: While wearing armor imbued with this sigil, your health is halved, but your Armor Class increases by 6.

ul.li: Health is reduced by half (rounded down) of the wearer’s maximum hit points.

description.p: This sigil imbues armor with resistance to all elemental attacks but exposes the wearer to increased damage from physical attacks.

setters.set: While wearing armor imbued with this sigil, you gain resistance to all elemental damage but become vulnerable to piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage.

ul.li: Resistance to all elemental damage (fire, cold, lightning, acid, thunder).
Vulnerability to piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage.

description.p: This sigil imbues armor with an unpredictable power that enhances the wearer’s ability to strike with a elemental attack attacks while making all other attacks less effective.

setters.set: While wearing armor imbued with this sigil, choose between (fire, ice, lightning, thunder and acid) and the selected elemental type's attacks gain a +3 bonus to hit, but all other attacks suffer a -3 penalty to hit. You cannot change the element once selected

ul.li: +3 bonus to hit with selected element attacks.
-3 penalty to hit with all other attacks (melee, ranged, and magical).

description.p: This sigil imbues armor with a powerful affinity for darkspawn, granting a significant advantage in combat against them but making the wearer vulnerable to other foes.

setters.set: While wearing armor imbued with this sigil, you gain a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls against darkspawn, but all other enemies gain advantage on attack rolls against you.

ul.li: +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls against darkspawn.
All other enemies gain advantage on attack rolls against the wearer.

description.p: This sigil imbues armor with the power of the cold, granting resistance to cold damage and the ability to cast **Cone of Cold** once per day, but leaves the wearer vulnerable to fire.

setters.set: While wearing armor imbued with this sigil, the wearer gains resistance to cold damage, can cast **Cone of Cold** once per day, but becomes vulnerable to fire damage (taking double damage from all fire-based attacks).

ul.li: Can cast **Cone of Cold** once per day (as an action).
Vulnerable to fire damage (taking double damage from all fire-based attacks).

description.p: This sigil imbues armor with the power of shadows, allowing the wearer to move through darkness with ease, but rendering them blind in bright light.

setters.set: While wearing armor imbued with this sigil, the wearer can move through shadows as if under the **Misty Step** spell once per short rest, and gain advantage on Stealth checks, but becomes blind in bright light or sunlight.

ul.li: Can move through shadows as if under the **Misty Step** spell once per short rest.
Blinded in bright light or sunlight.
